    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1

    Facet AccessibilityFeature_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1:AccessibilityFeature_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<AccessibilityFeature description="Door locks at wheelchair height." quantity="2" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1">
    <DisabilityFeature_Enum>Accessibility to goods and services</DisabilityFeature_Enum>
</AccessibilityFeature>

      Example JSON

      {
  "AccessibilityFeature" : {
    "quantity" : 2,
    "description" : "Door locks at wheelchair height.",
    "DisabilityFeature_Enum" : {
      "value" : "Accessibility to goods and services"
    }
  }
}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        DisabilityFeature_Enum
        An accessibility feature of the item being described. May be a guest room, a facility or other item.
        Details
        Type DisabilityFeature_Enum
        Example Value Accessibility to goods and services
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        quantity
        The quantity of this feature in the room.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:integer
        Example Value 2
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        description
        The description of the accessibility feature.
        Details
        Type StringLong
        Example Value Door locks at wheelchair height.
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
